name: ims-otp-forwarder
description: IMS SMS OTP forwarder â€” Telegram bot, MongoDB storage, live polling, dedupe. Heroku-ready.

CHAT_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram chat IDs to forward OTPs to (required)

USERNAME.description: IMS panel username (used for automated login if COOKIES not provided)

PASSWORD.description: IMS panel password (used for automated login if COOKIES not provided)

COOKIES.description: Optional cookie string to inject (format: "k=v; k2=v2"). If provided, script will try these first.

SITE_BASE.description: Base URL of the IMS site

POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in seconds for live fetch (float). Increase to reduce Telegram rate-limit risk.

STATE_FILE.description: Local filename used for short-term seen-state (dyno ephemeral). MongoDB is authoritative for dedupe.

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection string (set to your Atlas URI). WARNING: don't commit this publicly if sensitive.

FORWARD_IF_NO_CODE.description: If 'true' will forward messages even when no OTP code detected. Recommended: false

MAX_RELOGIN_RETRIES.description: How many consecutive relogin failures before exponential backoff kicks in
